atlas.controller

Class BasicController

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlas.controller.BasicController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoryController, ImageController, LanguageController, LoginController, ModelController, PageController, PathController

    public abstract class BasicController
extends Object
    Contains basic methods useful for all inheriting Controllers.
    Author:
    Michal Smrha
